name: Kids Dress Up
description:
KIDS DRESS UP (3 years and up, without advertisements) - Make your dream of a fashion stylist come true and learn to combine clothes and colours in a playful way.

With this dress-up game you have the opportunity to create your own style in a peaceful, quiet atmosphere. Choose between 3 cute dolls, lots of clothes in 5 colour combinations each from the wardrobe. An exception is the category "Special", which is hidden behind the star. Here you'll find a cute Indian costume, a cool astronaut suit and much more.

When you have dressed your doll and click on the camera, your outfit will be saved in your own gallery and can be admired again and again.

FEATURES:

  • Child-friendly: hand and joke-illustrated environments, characters and clothes
  • Parent-friendly: From parents for parents - we refrain from any kind of advertisements or promotional videos in our games to give your child undisturbed gaming fun.
  • Language neutral - We have deliberately refrained from any text queries. to make this game barrier-free
  • Made with <3 in Leipzig by wortgewitzt und krautnerds

PLAY ONLINE

Web: https://dressup.wortgewitzt.de
